hello:
:wave: Hey! I am **{{.botName}}**. Im capable of recording everything you say and transform it into an audio message.
:flag_gb: I am configured to talk to you in english.
:microphone2: To start recording, enter the channel **{{.voiceChannel}}** and start talking to me.
:sound: When you get out the channel, I will send the audio message.
